00025 #ifndef _BASE_EXTERNALIZABLE_
00026 #define _BASE_EXTERNALIZABLE_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/Object>
00030 #include <base/VFile>
00031 
00032 
00033 namespace base {
00034 
00035 class Externalizer;
00036 
00037 class Externalizable : public virtual base::Object
00038 {
00039 public:
00040   enum ExternalizationType { Input=1, Output=2, IO = 3 };
00041 
00042   virtual bool formatSupported(String format, Real version = 1.0, ExternalizationType type = IO) const = 0; ///< query if specific format is supported (for input, output or both)
00043   virtual void externalize(Externalizer& e, String format = "", Real version = 1.0) = 0; ///< read or write object state to Externalizer
00044   virtual void externalize(Externalizer& e, String format = "", Real version = 1.0) const; ///< write object state to Externalizer (throws if e is in Input)
00045 
00046 
00047   // convenience methods
00048   void load(ref<VFile> archive, const String& format = "", Real version = 1.0);
00049   void save(ref<VFile> archive, const String& format = "", Real version = 1.0);
00050 
00051 };
00052 
00053 } // base
00054 
00055 #endif
